column5: Nothing like ripping around an F1 track in a formula car!!!
That's awesome!  Heated grips?  Thanks for sharing!
That's why I always liked rear wheel drive. Half of the steering was done applying power to the rear wheels. Love it. Try that with a front wheel drive.....you wouldn't get around the first bend.
I think I was driving much the same yesterday
I hear you Terry... many times I was doing the powered 4 wheel drift last night coming home from the city! Only works with traction control OFF !

Cool vid guy has skills for sure. Thats a tough track on dry pavement.  Nordschleiffe hasnt hosted a f1 race since the 70s i believe. Too dangerous.  It is where Niki Lauda crashed and burned.  Would love to drive it one day.  Here's another crazy video if you like to steer with the throttle
